mapper.sql: item_id, use_id, equipment_id, main_param_name, main_param_value, equipment_num, equipment_effect, equipment_position, remarks, status, code, plan_use_id, use_at, is_use, cost_a1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO el_use_item( use_id, equipment_id, main_param_name, main_param_value, equipment_num, equipment_effect, equipment_position, remarks, status, code, plan_use_id, use_at, is_use,cost_a1 ) VALUES (#{useId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{equipmentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{mainParamName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mainParamValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{equipmentNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{equipmentEffect,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{equipmentPosition,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{planUseId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{useAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isUse,jdbcType=TINYINT},#{costA1,jdbcType=DOUBLE})
mapper.update:
UPDATE el_use_item
use_id = #{useId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
equipment_id = #{equipmentId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
main_param_name = #{mainParamName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
main_param_value = #{mainParamValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
equipment_num = #{equipmentNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
equipment_effect = #{equipmentEffect,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
equipment_position = #{equipmentPosition,jdbcType=BIGINT},
remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
plan_use_id = #{planUseId,jdbc=BIGINT},
use_at = #{useAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
cost_a1 = #{costA1,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
sign = #{sign,jdbcType=BIGINT},
WHERE item_id = #{itemId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT t1.*,dept.name as name,t1.equipment_effect AS sbName FROM el_use_item t1 LEFT JOIN el_department dept ON t1.equipment_position = dept.id WHERE item_id = #{itemId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND t1.status != 99 AND dept.status != 99
SELECT t1.*,dept.name as name FROM el_use_item t1 LEFT JOIN el_department dept ON t1.equipment_position = dept.id WHERE t1.use_id = #{useId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND dept.status != 99 AND t1.status != 99

select u1.*,dept.name as name from el_use_item u1 left join el_use u2 on u1.use_id = u2.id left join el_department dept on u1.equipment_position = dept.id where u1.is_use = 1 and u2.use_equipment_type = 1 and u1.equipment_position = #{equipmentPosition} and u1.status != 99

select sb.asset_comp AS assetComp, sb.asset_unit AS assetUnit, sb.name AS sbName, t1.equipment_num, t2.equipment_model AS equipmentModel, t1.cost_a1,t1.use_at,t1.remarks, t1.equipment_id,t1.sign, t1.use_id,sb.code , depart.code as deptCode, t1.equipment_effect as equipmentEffect from el_use_item t1 left join sb_equipment_z sb on t1.equipment_id = sb.id left join el_plan_use t2 on t1.plan_use_id = t2.id left join el_department depart on t1.equipment_position = depart.id where sb.status != 99 and t1.status != 99 and t2.is_del != 99 and t1.is_use = 1 and t2.equipment_type = 2 and depart.pcode = #{deptCode} and t1.equipment_effect = #{equipmentEffect} and year(t1.use_at) = #{useYear} and month(t1.use_at) = #{useMonth}
